title: Training Cup - Dr. Brown's Hard Spout Insulated Cup
description:
Dr Browns Hard Spout Insulated Cup
Perfect for developing your little one’s sipping skills – even on the go. Durable, lightweight and designed to keep drinks fresh and cool, this 10-ounce insulated cup is perfect for a little guy or gal who is in constant motion. Features a spill-proof hard spout with a one-piece silicone valve in place to develop your toddler’s sippy cup abilities, without having to deal with messy cleanups. Eye-catching, kid-friendly graphics make using this cup fun and exciting.

• Easy to assemble and clean
• Dishwasher safe
• 10 oz/300 ml
• Recommended for babies 12 months +
• Available in a variety of appealing characters and colors
